companyDescription: Nguyen Coffee Supply is America's first specialty Vietnamese coffee company and proud champion of the resilient robusta bean. We import through direct-trade relationships with Vietnamese farmers and roast in Brooklyn, New York. Founded in 2018 by 1st generation entrepreneur Sahra Nguyen, we're on a mission to change the future of coffee through diversity, sustainability and cultural integrity.
importPotentialReasoning: Nguyen Coffee Supply actively engages in both domestic and international trade, importing green coffee beans from Vietnam and selling roasted coffee and related products online and through retail partnerships.

sellingProducts.description: A blend of robusta and arabica beans, offering a smooth balance of nutty, chocolatey, and a hint of fruit. It's designed to be your everyday coffee and tastes amazing as espresso.
sellingProducts.name: Loyalty Blend

sellingProducts.description: 100% arabica beans, offering a lighter and fruitier coffee. It's also a rare specialty bean of Vietnam since it's less than 10% of Vietnam's total coffee production. Moxy is also excellent as an everyday coffee or espresso.
sellingProducts.name: Moxy

sellingProducts.description: Our strongest coffee, being 100% peaberry robusta. It has nearly 2x the caffeine content of Moxy. It's bold, strong, and surprisingly smooth!
sellingProducts.name: Truegrit

sellingProducts.description: Ready-to-drink 100% robusta cold brew, offering a bold, smooth, and strong coffee experience. It's 100% natural, dairy-free, gluten-free, and shelf-stable.
sellingProducts.name: Cold Brew: Classic Black

sellingProducts.description: Ready-to-drink 100% robusta cold brew with coconut milk, inspired by the traditional cà phê dừa of Vietnam. It's a bold, smooth, and strong coffee with a touch of coconut flavor. It's 100% natural, dairy-free, gluten-free, and shelf-stable.
sellingProducts.name: Cold Brew: Coconut
